attributes.action: Take action to remove Mugabe from power in Zimbabwe so to stop the killings and brutalitly clearly evident among residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we did with Iraq, the UK should take official action to remove Robert Mugabe from power and stop the abuse of innocent people; particuarly the many babies and children that are being harmed.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=reduce+fuel+tax&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
